level.heading: Attorney's fees.
level.text: Attorneys' fees and costs shall be awarded under this subchapter without regard to ability to pay.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Because of the codification of D.C. Law 20-34 as subchapter II of this chapter, and the designation of the preexisting text of Chapter 1 as subchapter I, "subchapter" has been substituted for "chapter", where applicable, in this section.
